definition: outside a building, (of a baseball pitch) on the far side of home plate from the batter, the outer side or surface of something
details:
adverb
- outside a building
= example: outside a building
= synonyms: outdoors, out of doors, alfresco
- on the outside
= example: on the outside
adjective
- (of a baseball pitch) on the far side of home plate from the batter
= synonyms: away
- originating or belonging beyond some bounds:'the outside world'
= example: originating or belonging beyond some bounds:'the outside world'
- on or toward an outer edge
- functioning outside the boundaries or precincts of an organized unit
- coming from the outside
= synonyms: external, extraneous
- very unlikely
= example: very unlikely
= synonyms: in a pig's eye, remote
- located, suited for, or taking place in the open air
= synonyms: outdoor, out-of-door
- relating to or being on or near the outer side or limit
= example: relating to or being on or near the outer side or limit
- leading to or from the outside
- from or between other countries
= synonyms: external
noun
- the outer side or surface of something
= synonyms: exterior
- the region that is outside of something
= synonyms: exterior
